content:
I've been trying to update wasmtime (Rust) in wasi-gfx-runtime from v17 to v21, and I find it really challenging. I've spend days on this already. There seems to be a lot of undocumented stuff.
Would anyone familiar with the recent updates to wasmtime::component be willing to do a pair programming session to help me finish the update?
Yes Iâ€™d be happy to help with that sometime this week (but not today)
DM me a couple of times that work for you
